GSD.description:
PM: hibernate: defer device probing when resuming from hibernation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit f7042cf9dd40733f387b7cac021e626c74b8856f. For more details please see the references link.
